name: Da Bees
description:
Da bees is an open world action game where you are an angry swarm of bees
seeking revenge on your human suppressors.

You use W,A,S,D to move around
Right mouse click shoots out a swarm of bees
Left mouse click shoots out a single bee

Andrew T. - programmer
Chandler S. - programmer
Kerem O. - artist
Noelle D. - artist
Haydn C. - sound designer
